description: Official music video for the song Leia with animation by 852-wa and music by Yuyoyuppe, performed by Luka Megurine.

tags.name: Vocal Synth
tags.description: Features one or more singers or characters that are products of a synthesize singing program. Popular examples are Vocaloids, UTAUloids, and CeVIOs.

node.description:
Megurine Luka, codenamed CV03, is a Japanese VOCALOID developed and distributed by Crypton Future Media, Inc., and was initially released in January 2009 for the VOCALOID2 engine. She is the third release of Crypton's Character Vocal Series and is a Character Voice VOCALOID.

Her voice is provided by the Japanese voice actress and singer, [Yuu Asakawa](https://anilist.co/staff/95119), who was recorded in Japanese and English for the voicebank.

__[Website (Yuyoyuppe)](http://yuyoyuppe.com/)__ | __[Website (DJ'TEKINA)](http://djtekina.club/)__ | __[Blog](https://lineblog.me/yupeyupe/)__ | __[Twitter (Yuyoyuppe)](https://twitter.com/yupeyupe)__ | __[Twitter (DJ'TEKINA//SOMETHING)](https://twitter.com/TEKINASOMETHING)__ | __[Twitter (N.I.C.K)](http://shorturl.at/vDFK6)__ | __[Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/tekisome)__

__Introduction:__
Yuyoyuppe, alternatively known as DJ TEKINA//SOMETHING, otherwise known by nickname Yuppe is a Japanese DJ, vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, remixer and member of the band Naked Identitiy Created by King (N.I.C.K), the band GRILLED MEAT YOUNGMANS and the creator unit [Heart's Cry](https://anilist.co/staff/252231/).

__Biography:__
He became involved in music activities for the first time when he was in high school, there he played the guitar and did the vocals for a band. Later on, when he discovered the now famous video uploading site Nico Nico Douga, he would start posting videos there himself. This would start in 2008, and he would upload mainly VOCALOID-type music meshed with loud rock colors. He gained immense popularity on the site and was even entered into the Nico Nico Douga hall of fame. He was particularly interested in a song titled "Hope", but because his lyrics made his feelings popular, he began to write lyrics that were far from fiction and closer to reality. This, he said, described himself.

He would later make a major debut on the album "Story of Hope", which would come ou on September 26 of 2012. Later on January 16 of 2013, the album "Wall in the presence -Yuppeism edition-" was released on the iTunes Store. Even later on July 16 of 2014, the album "Bokaro Holic" was released. While participating in the making of all of these albums, he was also in-charge of the vocals in the band My Eggplant Died Yesterday, though the band suspended in July of 2014. From this suspension, a new band would form, titled "GRILLED MEAT YOUNGMANS".

Yuyoyuppe has also been involved in the production of BABYMETAL's songs "ウ・キ・ウ・キ★ミッドナイト (Uki Uki ☆ Midnight)", "BABYMETAL DEATH", "メギツネ (Megitsune)", etc. He has also performed extensively, appearing at the ROCK IN JAPAN FESTIVAL and at the SUMMER SONIC, under the name "DJ'TEKINA//SOMETHING".

(Source: [Wikipedia (Yuyoyuppe)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%86%E3%82%88%E3%82%86%E3%81%A3%E3%81%BA), edited)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/85l28) | [Nico Nico Douga](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/11592603/mylist) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/31990)

Meola or 853-wa is a Japanese illustrator who has participated in several PVs and albums, usually focusing in rock-related works. Their work is characterized by their colorful illustration and rather abstract illustrations.

__[Website (Yuyoyuppe)](http://yuyoyuppe.com/)__ | __[Website (DJ'TEKINA)](http://djtekina.club/)__ | __[Blog](https://lineblog.me/yupeyupe/)__ | __[Twitter (Yuyoyuppe)](https://twitter.com/yupeyupe)__ | __[Twitter (DJ'TEKINA//SOMETHING)](https://twitter.com/TEKINASOMETHING)__ | __[Twitter (N.I.C.K)](http://shorturl.at/vDFK6)__ | __[Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/tekisome)__
